en: Answer me when I call, O God of my righteousness; Thou hast set me at large when I was in distress: Have mercy upon me, and hear my prayer.
hmr: Aw ka felna Pathien, ka ko pha che chun mi hung dawn la, Ka lunginzîng chun nangin i mi sukthawveng hlak a: Mi lunginsiet la, ka ṭawngṭâina hi mi ngaipêk la.

en: O ye sons of men, how long shall my glory be turned into dishonor? How long will ye love vanity, and seek after falsehood? [Selah
hmr: Aw mihriem nauhai, ka ropuina hi ieng chen am muolphonaah in inchan ding a na? Iengchen am thil teplo hi ngainâng in ta, khêlthu hi in zawng ding?

en: But know that Jehovah hath set apart for himself him that is godly: Jehovah will hear when I call unto him.
hmr: LALPA chun Pathien ngaisak mi chu ama ta dingin a sie tum ti hi hre lem ro: LALPA chun ka ko po leh ngai a tih.

en: Stand in awe, and sin not: Commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. [Selah
hmr: Ṭi unla, thil suksuol naw ro; In khumlaizâwla chun in lungrilah inngaituo unla, to ṭhiep ro.

en: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, And put your trust in Jehovah.
hmr: Felna inthâwinahai chu inhlân unla, LALPAA chun ringna innghat ro.

en: Many there are that say, Who will show us any good? Jehovah, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.
hmr: “Ṭhatna hrim hrim tuin am min hmutir a ti leh?” tituhai chu tamtak an um. LALPA nang ngeiin i hmêl var khan mi hang ên rawh.

en: Thou hast put gladness in my heart, More than they have when their grain and their new wine are increased.
hmr: Ka lungrila chun lâwmna i sie tah a, An bu le an uoin hung hlâwk chânga lâwmna an nei nêka nasa lem chu.

en: In peace will I both lay me down and sleep; For thou, Jehovah, alone makest me dwell in safety.
hmr: Lungmuongtakin zâl ka ta, in ka tih: LALPA nang ngei hi i nih, makhât chau khawma him- taka mîn umtir hlaktu chu.
